projects.title: Portfolio v2
projects.intro: Take a deep dive into the features of this portfolio website including Web Analytics and Speed Insights. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and Headless UI.

features.label: Metadata & Search Engine Optimization
features.desc: Using the Next.js Metadata API,static and dynamic MetaData is generated for each page, & each project.

features.label: Dark Mode Theme Toggler
features.desc: Using TailwindCSS and the Next Themes npm package, the user can toggle their preferred theme.

features.label: Responsive layout
features.desc: Every component has been meticously configured to handle desktop and mobile platforms with a phenomonal user experience.

features.label: Dynamic Page Server Components
features.desc: Html files are being create on the server before being sent to the client allowing for extremely fast load times.

features.label: Web Analytics - Granular Visitor Data
features.desc: Tracks page views, top pages, top sources and visitors, including their country location, operating system, and browser.

features.label: Speed Insights - Real Experience Score
features.desc: Provides detailed insights of the website's performance metrics to analyze optimization decisions with FCP, LCP, FID, and TFB.
